pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Formula Natural Bronze Gradual Tanning 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Natural Bronze Gradual Tanning Moisturiser uses a skin-friendly vegetable-based tanning ingredient sourced from sugar beets.Treat your skin to a daily dose of summer with this deeply hydrating tanning lotion that is quick to dry, and smells like coconut.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. If irritation or rash persists, consult a doctor. Keep out of reach of children. This product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin aging, and other harmful effects to the skin. Always apply a sunscsreen if spending time in the sun.

Common Uses

For all skin tones. Builds and maintains a natural-looking tan. Ethically and sustainably sourced Coconut Oil and Tahitian Monoi nourish skin to help maintain a healthy looking, bronze glow. Streak free for even colour.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Dihydroxyacetone, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Bentonite, Palmitic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Stearic Acid, Sodium Metabisulfate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Sulfite, Myristyl Alcohol, Lauryl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Coumarin.

Directions

Apply evenly to clean, dry skin once daily or as often as necessary to achieve desired level of colour. Allow a few minutes to dry before dressing. Wash hands after application.
